website_summaries.verdict: Works quickly and maintains a constant temperature of the water to ensure high-quality coffee.
pros: Interesting cylindrical design of the brewer housing means this coffee maker will look great on your counter
Includes a thermal carafe that keeps coffee hot a long time
Uses a copper boiling element to maintain a consistent water temperature
cons: Plastic parts may not stand up to long-term use, causing leaks

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for five days. Already broke. I have the technivorm moccamaster with the thermal carafe. There is a button that the carafe sits against to open the part with the grounds. Button is already broke.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee.  Lousy design.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great tasting coffee. Design is terrible. To make a pot of coffee involves taking half the parts off (2 lids, move water spout, etc) and sooner or later the 1mm thick pad under the pot will not be seated properly, which will result in the coffee valve not opening and a big countertop mess. The pad cannot be positively locked to the base in any meaningful way. It’s as if they never tested this thing.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Torgeson

customer_reviews.title: Very simple and very cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift...but tried it out for a month to make sure it wasn't a complete scam. I liked the simple and basic features. Quality metal surfaces. The plastic does feel cheap and a little loose in fitting...for the cost. It does make a good cup of coffee. I am a press-coffee person, so it was still a slight step down from that. However, it makes coffee quick. It is very simple to use. It was very simple to clean. The carafe holds the coffee hot enough for a relaxing weekend cup of coffee. The people who received this coffee maker replaced theirs and are still using it....and if you knew them, that is very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I love coffee. All of the little tasting notes that ...
customer_reviews.text: We had switched to one of the pod coffees and that was ok, but I wanted to go back to real coffee. I researched and read a lot of reviews. All I can say is WOW. I love coffee. All of the little tasting notes that you see on a bag of coffee talking about a hint of this, a note of that.....This has made the best coffee I have ever had. The only problem is it is hard for me to drink any other coffee. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pattie Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made and definately not worth $300. Too many steps involved to drink a cup of coffee and a terrible lack of automation . Don't know who they paid for the good ratings. I would give it no stars if that were an option.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie G.

customer_reviews.title: I'm extremely disappointed—Coffee grounds and water all over my  kitchen counter : seems defective
customer_reviews.text: I ve had two Moccamasters that I used daily over the years and and never had an issue . I unboxed my new machine and used it this morning— a disaster. the water and grounds never left the filter then it overflowed and it flooded my kitchen counter — on first use. The instruction refer to opening and closing the filter holder but it has no such capacity: probably shipped the wrong filter holder with the machine. I don't know but I am livid: After paying $300+ for a coffeemaker I expect better than water and grounds everywhere and no coffee. I'm about to call the seller and will update to let you know how they respond.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet Washington

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: After some research I landed on this Moccamaster and have been enjoying it for 6 months. It looks great on the counter and is easy to use. Heated glass carafes always ruined the coffee for me and the Moccamaster's thermal carafe keeps the coffee warm for hours. I love not worrying about any kids burning themselves on the carafe because it's not hot on the outside and even comes with a resealable lid.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: the last one I'll ever buy?
customer_reviews.text: I hope it lasts about 700 years then because I plan on living as long as they did in the Bible!!
customer_reviews.author: janae

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coffee Every Time!
customer_reviews.text: Unit is large but makes the best coffee of any coffee maker that I have owned. It is expensive too but the coffee quality is important to me. I buy expensive Costa Rican coffee and want to taste it! The only thing that I would like is a timer system for automatic brewing. 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Bow Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Kapers backed up their sales and service was great. The thermos arrived with a slight dimple (dent)
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen Kapers backed up their sales and service was great. The thermos arrived with a slight dimple (dent). I mentioned this to Kitchen Kapers and they called Technivorm on my behalf to order a replacement. A brand new thermos arrived within the week. Moccamaster is the best coffee maker, especially with the new CDGT model which does not require adjustment to the brew basket. My first Moccamaster brew basket would overflow if I was not careful with the flow adjustment. Now I don't have any worries and the coffee is perfect. I would recommend this coffee maker to anyone who loves a perfect cup every time. Lastly, it makes a full pot, at the right temperature really quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: We returned this coffee maker after a week of use. The flavor was fine but even with heating up the stainless steel carafe it was not hot enough for us. Also, we have a reverse osmosis water system and because of the copper tubing we could not use our water to make the coffee - not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice; looks cool; works fast
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit hesitant at first as i didnt know the brand -- but glad we got this one. Besides looking very cool......it actually is fast and easy. makes great coffee. Love the thermal pot -- as it's nice to take in the room on weekend mornings -- or just when watching TV. Appears well made. time will tell -- but very happy with this now.
customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: did not last
customer_reviews.text: it worked great but only lasted 30 months for the price it should have lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: Edmund A Laflamme jr

customer_reviews.title: Great Dutch manufactured coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this coffee maker. It makes a perfect pot of coffee. Very easy to use and clean. I really like that it is Dutch made and the quality shows.
customer_reviews.author: Edward S. Paluch

customer_reviews.title: CDTG Model - after two weeks, the water tube went black. Mfr said likely a short.
customer_reviews.text: Returning it and buying another model. Makes great coffee..... likely I just had the luck to pull a lemon !!!
customer_reviews.author: Carole, East Chatham, NY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time.
customer_reviews.text: Good coffee starts with the correct water temperature...well, maybe not “starts” with the water, but it is incredibly important to achieve the proper H2O temp. Technivorm nails it every time.
customer_reviews.author: dharmabumjon

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This coffee pot makes delicious coffee quickly and keeps it warm for hours
customer_reviews.author: Aqua1324

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy your morning. Great coffee. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee. Easy to clean. Bought as alternative to french press. Sometimes I preheat the pot with warm/hot water... sometimes I don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Snowdonkey

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed
customer_reviews.text: All the parts have to be aligned just so for coffee not to go everywhere. And the thermos does not keep the coffee warm and tasty as promised. I did a lot of research on this and wish I had listened to the negative reviews. Flavor is indeed good if it works.
customer_reviews.author: KEJ

customer_reviews.title: The best coffee maker!
customer_reviews.text: Consistent great taste to coffee and the only 5 year warranty Ive ever seen. These people ONLY MAKE coffee makers.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Yummy coffee
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is delicious, hot, and assembly every morning isn't too complicated. The only warning I give is this: make sure that the bottom tray that your carafe sits on is in place, or the lever that releases your brew from the brew basket will not open and drain into your carafe. Which means that you'll have coffee spilling all over your counters, cabinets, floor....
customer_reviews.author: Debra Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Love making coffee in the morning now!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new coffee maker. It makes great coffee and its quick. Easy to clean and it keeps the coffee hot for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best coffee ever.
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best coffee ever. took a little getting use to, but we love it now
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful coffee maker- doesn't come with metal filter - at this price you think it should.
customer_reviews.author: midknight

customer_reviews.title: Tasted "silky" coffee for the first time
customer_reviews.text: Making a truly great cup of coffee is a mix of art and science. Read up and experiment. I gave my Bonavita BV1800TH to my brother in order to trade up to the Technivorm Moccamaster CDGT. Since having this unit I've made the most delicious coffee imaginable -- twice. The rest of the time it is damn good coffee. But when you get it just right, you will never forget it. I live in pursuit of perfecting the art of making truly great coffee. This is the unit that will get me there.
customer_reviews.author: Dare Carden

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Maker Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker might not have any bells and whistles but the one thing it does do is make great consistent coffee. Easy to use and clean. Makes a pot in about 5 minutes or so. The carafe keeps the coffee hot for several hours and cleans easy. It is pricey but I think worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Price

customer_reviews.title: We really enjoy this coffee machine and it's so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy this coffee machine and it's so easy to use. We also feel much better for the environment, less waste. We stopped using Keurig and K-Cup after seeing how much waste it creates
customer_reviews.author: HC. J.

customer_reviews.title: Fast pot!
customer_reviews.text: FAST! Full pot in about 5 minutes, almost three times faster than my old brewer.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoeMN

customer_reviews.title: This machine makes the BEST coffee! We LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! This machine makes the BEST coffee! We LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShoppingAddict

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and good tasting
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun to watch brew and the taste is as good as promised. I like the feature of being able to pour a cup before it is done brewing
customer_reviews.author: Soccer123456789

customer_reviews.title: The elegant simple design is beautiful and makes great tasting coffee
customer_reviews.text: The elegant simple design is beautiful and makes great tasting coffee. The thermos keeps it hot for hours. Very impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J.

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee brewer I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee brewer I have ever used. More time consuming than a mister coffee type but the end results are consistent and right on the money.
customer_reviews.author: RCP7188

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee pot
customer_reviews.text: If you like HOT coffee, you will like this coffee pot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and delicious
customer_reviews.text: Love the carafe! Best coffee ever, and well worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Uses less coffee and produces an amazing cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Uses less coffee and produces an amazing cup of coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hill

customer_reviews.title: Thermal carafe not warm
customer_reviews.text: The thermal carafe does not work - coffee goes cold very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sean Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Moccamaster....their is no other coffee maker I would have
customer_reviews.author: Songbird

customer_reviews.title: Very Expensive and Disappointing Coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: This coffee brewer is very disappointing. The first cup is nice and hot, temperature measured and is as advertised, but coffee cools quickly and subsequent cups have to be heated in the microwave. Called the company and got a replacement thermos but it did not help. I clean the pot with the recommended cleaner and use paper filters and follow all directions. We are coffe lovers and had high expectations for this pot but they were not met.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen O.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee but check it out first
customer_reviews.text: Makes great coffee, but if all the pieces are not aligned it will run coffee all over ( done it twice) Having so many loose parts seems cheap. Also be sure to check Counter height, mine is half inch too tall to fit under cabinet !
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker is simple and makes great coffee. The parts are removable for washing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a coffee maker I love!
customer_reviews.text: It has exceeded my expectations. It is of the highest quality; the design concept is that keeping the water at an even temperature throughout the brewing cycle produces a superior cup of coffee. The thermal carafe keeps the coffee hot without that "bitter" taste from coffee that sits too long on the warming plate. And it makes a delicious pot of coffee in only 4 to 6 minutes. I also like the 5 year warranty. For those who enjoy a great cup of coffee, I would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: pat mcarren

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker on the market
customer_reviews.text: Assuming you begin with good beans and a good grind, you can do no better than the moccamaster. It makes the cleanest, truest cup of coffee I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Keith McNichols

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: It does live up to they hype. Coffee taste the same every time. Coffee is the same temp each time. I do recommend purchasing a carafe if you dont drink the coffee within 4 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee...
customer_reviews.text: This coffee maker brews a great cup of coffee. The only thing that keeps it from getting a 5 star rating is that the reservoir only hols 6 cups of coffee. The markings on the side indicates 10, but it is really 6 US cups. I believe the markings may be European...not sure though. We love the coffee and that's what matters most.
customer_reviews.author: Baatraveler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. 3 months of use and product is malfunctioning. Do not buy as no way to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee since the Bodum
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee. Delivered quickly, answered with my questions immediately and efficiently. In fact I will order another to give as a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: The heating element is probably the best in the market
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the most expensive coffee makers out there. The heating element is probably the best in the market. But,..., Everything else about it is cheap. The plastic parts, carafe, and body just look flimsy. In fact one of the plastic tabs that holds the coffee container in place arrived broken. We would have just exchanged it, but we were so disappointed with the build quality, we returned it. Bought a different brand; couldn't be happier. I am not sure the heating element alone warrants the price point of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee and fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this coffee maker. It makes great coffee and it is fun to watch work, but maybe because I just need to get out more. Having said that, I think the coffee basket might be a bit on the small side. I typically make 6 cups and use the recommended 6 tablespoons of coffee. This comes close to filling the basket (after the grounds are wet) and I would worry about making 8 or 10 cups.
customer_reviews.author: Skwerl

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Plastic Disaster
customer_reviews.text: Too many plastic pieces for this price. If all the plastic pieces aren't aligned perfectly, the coffee goes everywhere. Once this happens ground get in places that makes this happen more frequently. I know the reviews are positive, and it looks cool, but stay away. The carafe is great, but you could buy that separately. I regret purchasing this machine. It is over priced. Update: After a few months of use, I am hating this machine even more. The plastic foot easily moves out of its groove, and if you have to move the machine to fill it with water or grounds, the foot will become dislodged there is no snap or lock.
customer_reviews.author: Bejcunni

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived broken. Would have expected better given the cost. Being returned. Really poor packing job, looks like someone just threw it into the box and hoped for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaky product
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but was afraid it was damaged when I opened the box. Sure enough the thing leaked. I noticed the manufacturer had attempted a crumby fix but it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Waggy

customer_reviews.title: The Moccamaster neuters coffee and leaves me verklempt.
customer_reviews.text: So, I know that all the coffee purists tell me that I am supposed to like "smooth" coffee. If that is what you want, then mazel tov, get this. But, I just don't like that kind of coffee. I want coffee with chutzpah. The Moccamaster neuters coffee and leaves me verklempt. So I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Outis Nemo

customer_reviews.title: Best Brewers in the Market!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Mocca Master. The first one had to be at least 15 years old, and was still working perfectly. But even after keeping it clean, the taste had gotten bitter. I just brewed my first pot with this one, and its a beauty! The difference in taste is incredible. I love the cylindrical shape and finish. The cup design is very different and a little more complex, but seems fantastic. The pot has the. new spout which helps retain heat while brewing and "stirs" the coffee. I wish there was somewhere convenient to store that piece , like a hook on the back of the machine. Bottomline, these are the best brewers out there!
customer_reviews.author: Denali96

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent !!
customer_reviews.text: I've noticed that coffee makers in the $100-$125 range only last about two years now, or that's been my experience. Nor do they get the water hot enough, or saturate all the grounds. The Technivorm Moccamaster solves these problems. Our coffee is very hot, and very delicious. WE now enjoy the best coffee we've ever had. The downside is that we only like our own coffee now. I recommend investing in a good electreic grinder also, because I wish I had been grinding our own coffee all this time. The coffee has no bitterness, my stomache is not effected, and any coffee is vastly improved by grinding at home. Happy drinking !
customer_reviews.author: devin farrelly

customer_reviews.title: Jumping on the bandwagon
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee. This coffee maker is great. I have a Bonavita which is also a great coffee machine. This is a better machine. Why? Water temperature might be similar, but the Moccamaster gives me some more control. I can fill the filter basket with hot water, let it sit for 30 seconds and then drain. It is also better constructed. The Bonavita is built ok. Listen, there's a big price difference between the 2. So, it is worth the extra $$? Maybe not. Really depends on how much you want to spend. The Moccamaster is also better looking, so if you care about what looks better on your counter top than this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: yongjoo

customer_reviews.title: I wish everything was made this well!
customer_reviews.text: This item is pricey but worth every penny. It has been working flawlessly for the first 100 pots I have made. Excellent consistent results. Looking forward to years of use and delicious coffee. FOr best results: I recommend using a digital scale to weigh out your ground coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L. Abbate

customer_reviews.title: Graduation Gift
customer_reviews.text: My partner is an absolute coffee connoisseur and he absolutely loves this machine! The flavor of our coffee is far superior to the standard coffee pot brewing method.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The machine was a refurb. From the minute we opened it the works of the machine seemed inexpensive. We discovered someone had tucked a broken, plastic of course, piece inside the pot. This broken piece prevented us from making coffee. So much for refurb. It’s obvious no one tested this machine
customer_reviews.author: A Sheets

customer_reviews.title: This is my second Moccamaster coffee maker. The first ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Moccamaster coffee maker. The first was a Moccamaster CDT, which I purchased in 2008. It stopped working (likely the heating element) and we immediately purchased another one to replace the old. The price is higher now, but I wouldn't buy any other coffee maker. The differences between the older CDT and the new CDGT are minimal. It comes with both the brew-through cap and the solid cap, it doesn't have a selector switch for whole pot, half-pot, or stop brew, the styling on the front of water tower is different, and it doesn't have the plastic plate under the coffee pot (or my husband threw it away when he unpacked the box).
customer_reviews.author: wall0304

customer_reviews.title: I like a hot cup of coffee and this very well-made ...
customer_reviews.text: I like a hot cup of coffee and this very well-made product does just that. Read the directions. I rinse the carafe in hot water before I put it next to the system as the directions say and the coffee is hot and delicious. Once the coffee is brewed, turn the system off and put the carafe on the disk they provide. I have used delcal brand cleaner and descaling powders as they have suggested. I will see how long this product will deliver. So far for the 8 mts I have had this, so good. Well-made and the design is quite well-done.
customer_reviews.author: Julie V. Ponce

customer_reviews.title: the perfect home brewer for those who like great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love strong coffee and my husband likes weak stuff (think Starbucks vs Dunkin) when either of us use this we get a perfect cup. there is no bitterness. i couldn't believe it, six minutes to this delicious velvety cup of coffee. The filter holder can fit 2 T per 6oz cup (stronger coffee) NOTE: the numbers on the water reservoir are cups based on 4oz cups (European) so I just wrote the ounces out on the reservoir with a permanent marker so I can size out my cups i would buy this over and over and over again. the price is high but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: buzziag

customer_reviews.title: Second Moccamaster in 10 years
customer_reviews.text: This machine makes delicious coffee so fast! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality coffee maker. I don't know if the coffee tastes sooo much better than from other machines as I think it depends more on the coffee. Quality is rock solid and it's pretty fast: Full carafe in under 6 min.
customer_reviews.author: Varianti

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee. All the reviews of high end coffee makers compare themselves to this one. Tried others. This makes rather best coffee. Nothing fancy about the system. It brews at the right temperature. Easy to clean. Great coffee every day.
customer_reviews.author: Barry & Joca Craig

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee maker I have ever owned. So this is what coffee should taste like. I only had Folgers on hand the first time I used it. I swear I tasted notes in that coffee that I never have. The thermal carafe keeps the coffee hot 10+ hours. Easy to use and gorgeous to look at.I found mine at an Amazon warehouse sale and saved $100.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect all around.
customer_reviews.text: More than met my expectation. Very efficient, attractive and makes great coffee fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jabu

customer_reviews.title: This model does not have the valve on the drip ...
customer_reviews.text: This model does not have the valve on the drip cone to set for smaller volume. I did not realize this when I bought it. I will call the supplier on Monday.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing else does coffee like this pot. First one lasted 13 years. No question about replacing it with another just like it. Perfect coffee every time.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: The coffee made is far superior to my old machine
customer_reviews.text: Another best-of-breed appliance that takes their task (here making coffee) seriously enough to think things through. The coffee made is far superior to my old machine.
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: High quality coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: If you want a quality drip coffee maker, here it is. No Chinese made trash here.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it for several months, and it's been awesome! The carafe keeps coffee hot for SO long. I'll make a pot in the morning and by that evening it's still a little warm.
customer_reviews.author: MommaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: simply the best of coffee you can make. Remember you need the bean grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Waugh

customer_reviews.title: The best coffee maker hands down
customer_reviews.text: The best coffee maker hands down!! Coffee is made very fast and the tempature is nice and hot. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST Coffee you'll drink
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC! Coffee is better then you'll every get from any coffee place in the world. This machine is not only quick but the carafe keeps the coffee HOT up to 4 1/2 hours! My advise is to warm up the machine by putting 2 cups of water in then brewing it through a paper filter before you place the grind. This helps warm the pot to 200 degrees. No kidding, BEST machine I've every had and lives up to it's reputation.
customer_reviews.author: arothenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Great - worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee maker, pot failed within 6 months , the manufacture replaced promply,semt new pot with prepaid return sticker.
customer_reviews.author: salison

customer_reviews.title: Really makes good coffee. Quick
customer_reviews.text: Really makes good coffee. Quick. Carafe is only okay but coffee and operation of the Brewer is so good....still five stars.
customer_reviews.author: 3b6

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for office and brew 2 times per day. After about 2 months, about 150 brews later, the water stopped boiling. It's done. What a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER !!
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews with nit picky comments, thought it over and went with Technivorm. Much better than my previous, slightly cheaper Danish made machine that was supposed to be "just like". Get this one, it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: R Borg

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This is Best drip coffee ever,no bells no whistles , love the coffee , it is smoother ,hot,and it is quick!
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: After using for several months I would buy another if ...
customer_reviews.text: After using for several months I would buy another if I had to. Easiest coffee maker to use and clean I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: great coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: there is simply no better drip coffee maker. the secret is the copper heating element (all others use aluminum). a thermal carafe is provided which, if you fill with hot water before putting it in drip position, provides a great and hot cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Hart

customer_reviews.title: I am waiting to receive the exchanged product to see how good their return/exchange policy is and to see how it ...
customer_reviews.text: The coffee maker had a crack in the water resevoir that wasn't discovered until that wasn.t discovered until the initial cleaning cycle, I am waiting to receive the exchanged product to see how good their return/exchange policy is and to see how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Still waiting
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order this so imagine my disappointment when it came defective (hand made?) I mailed it back the next day ASAP. It's been over 24 hours and a new one has not been mailed out for the defective unit I sent back. It will be 2 weeks on my bill with no product at this rate. More than frustrated and my stars are shrinking fast...
customer_reviews.author: klds

customer_reviews.title: never got to use had to send back
customer_reviews.text: never got to use it .was missing manual ,warranty card ,all paper work . tried to get from manufacturer but could not . so i had to send back . brought as new but brought into question that it could be a refurbished unit and they have no warranty . too expensive to not come with a warranty ,so i returned it .
customer_reviews.author: gh

product_meta.title: Technivorm Moccamaster CDGT Coffee Brewer, 40 oz, Polished Silver
product_meta.description: The Moccamaster 89912 cdgt coffeemaker features a thermal carafe and an automatic drip-stop brew-basket that stops the flow of coffee if the carafe is pulled away. The cdgt coffeemaker brews a full 40 Ounce pot of Coffee in six minutes. The thermal carafe will keep your Coffee hot for up to an hour. To keep Coffee hot longer or for traveling with your carafe, switch to the included travel lid. All Moccamaster Coffee Brewers are handmade in the Netherlands and backed by an industry leading 5-year.
feature_bullets: The top thermal carafe Coffee maker choice of coffee brewing experts
Easy use, one button Operation and 4-6 minute brew time for a 10 cup carafe of Coffee
Perfectly brewed Coffee Delivered by our copper element and no Pumps
Coffee maker features a stainless steel thermal carafe to keep Coffee hot longer
Backed by a hassle free 5-year. Volts - 120V. Watts- 1400W
